attractions.name: Cliffs of Moher
attractions.description: Ireland's most visited natural attraction. Towering 214m above the Atlantic, with breathtaking views of the Aran Islands and Galway Bay.

attractions.name: The Burren
attractions.description: Unique limestone landscape with rare flora, ancient monuments, and spectacular walking trails.

attractions.name: Doolin Cave
attractions.description: Home to the Great Stalactite, one of the world's longest free-hanging stalactites at 7.3 meters.

attractions.name: Aran Islands Ferry
attractions.description: Daily ferries to Inis Oírr, Inis Meáin, and Inis Mór. Experience traditional Irish island life.

attractions.name: Doolin Pier & Harbour
attractions.description: Charming fishing harbor with coastal walks and stunning sunset views.

attractions.name: Traditional Music Pubs
attractions.description: Doolin is Ireland's music capital. Nightly trad sessions at McGann's, Gus O'Connor's, and McDermott's.

attractions.name: Ailwee Cave
attractions.description: Ancient cave system with underground waterfall and Birds of Prey Centre.

attractions.name: Lahinch Beach
attractions.description: Blue Flag beach and Ireland's premier surfing destination. Great for families.

activities.name: Cliff Walking
activities.description: Coastal cliff walks with spectacular views. Various difficulty levels available.

activities.name: Traditional Music Sessions
activities.description: Experience authentic Irish traditional music in Doolin's famous pubs.

activities.name: Surfing & Water Sports
activities.description: Surf lessons and equipment hire at nearby Lahinch Beach.

activities.name: Rock Climbing
activities.description: World-class sport climbing and bouldering in the Burren.

activities.name: Cycling
activities.description: Cycle the Wild Atlantic Way with stunning coastal scenery.

activities.name: Bird Watching
activities.description: Spot puffins, razorbills, and other seabirds at the cliffs.

activities.name: Fishing
activities.description: Sea angling trips and shore fishing available locally.

activities.name: Horse Riding
activities.description: Beach and trail rides through the Burren landscape.
